publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-807.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Budget (Scotland) Bill-As an amendment to motion (S2M-807) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end "but, in so doing, is concerned that it does not give enough consideration to Scotland's poor economic performance relative to the rest of the UK and calls upon the Scottish Executive to further address this underperformance as a matter of urgency."
